```{r}
df_list <- list(data84, data85, data86, data87, data88, data89, data90, data91, data92, data93, data94, data95, data96, data97, data98, data99, data00, data01, data02, data03, data04, data05, data06, data07, data08, data09, data10, data11, data12, data13, data14, data15, data16)
```

```{r}
#merge all data frames in list
all_df = df_list %>% reduce(full_join, by=c("id", "plotid", "NAME", "STATE", "change", "changeNote", "startYear", "endYear"))
```

```{r}

df3 = df2 %>%
  pivot_longer(!c("id", "plotid", "NAME", "STATE", "change", "changeNote", "startYear", "endYear"), names_to = "nbrYr", values_to = "nbr") %>%
  pivot_longer(!c("id", "plotid", "NAME", "STATE", "change", "changeNote", "nbrYr", "nbr"), names_to = "startEnd", values_to = "year") %>%
  mutate(prePost = ifelse(startEnd == "startYear", "preNbr", "postNbr")) 

df3
```

```{r}
df4 <- df3[df3$nbrYr==df3$year, ]

df4
```
letter = ifelse(grade %in% 60:69, "D",
 mutate(prePost = factor(prePost, c( 'PreNbr', 'postNbr'), ordered = T)) 
```{r}
df5 <- df4 %>% 
  mutate(prePost = factor(ifelse(startEnd == "startYear", "preNBR", "postNBR"), ordered = T)) 

df5
```  
```{r}
df6 = df5 %>%
  group_by(id) %>% 
  mutate(diff = lag(nbr, 1) - nbr) 
df6
```

%>%
  dplyr::select(id, plotid, diff) %>%
  drop_na()


```{r}
df7 = df6 %>% dplyr::select(id, plotid, NAME, change, changeNote, diff) %>%
  rename(dnbr = diff) %>%
  drop_na()

df7
  
```
```{r}
plot1 = ggplot(data = df7, aes(x=change, y=dnbr)) +
  geom_boxplot()

plot1
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
ggsave("../figures/boxplot1.png", plot = plot1, width = 6, height = 4, units = c("in"), dpi = 600)
```

```{r}
df8 = df7 %>% filter(change=="Harvest")

df8
```

```{r}
plot2 = ggplot(data = df8, aes(x=changeNote, y=dnbr)) +
  geom_boxplot()

plot2
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
ggsave("../figures/boxplot2.png", plot = plot2, width = 6, height = 4, units = c("in"), dpi = 600)
```

# Merge with orginal data table

```{r}

data_dnbr = all_df %>% 
  left_join(df3, by="plotid") %>%
  dplyr::select(plotid:endYear, diff) %>%
  rename(dnbr = diff) %>%
  drop_na()

data_dnbr
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = data_dnbr, aes(x=change, y=dnbr)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
harvest = data_dnbr %>%
  filter(change=="Harvest")

harvest
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = harvest, aes(x=changeNote, y=dnbr)) +
  geom_boxplot()

```
